issue.title: [Rust] [DataFusion] Switch from Box<Schema> --> SchemaRef (Arc<Schema>) to be consistent with the rest of Arrow
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-9899](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-9899). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
The idea is to  use SchemaRef (which is an Arc<Schema>) instead of Box<Schema> inside Datafusion to be consistent with the rest of the arrow implementation, avoid so many copies, and make the code simpler.
